title: Mathematics Education Competency Enhancement Program Based on Overseas Service-Learning

context.prior_knowledge: College-level foundational mathematics (calculus, linear algebra) and basic programming knowledge
context.additional_context: Project-based service learning program conducted in smartphone-based learning environments. Simultaneous development of language proficiency and educational practical skills through math education camp design for middle school students abroad

learning_goals: Acquiring intermediate-level Spanish communication skills (daily conversation, basic expressions for educational contexts) for overseas environmental adaptation.
Design and develop at least two educational modules (games, coding projects, etc.) utilizing middle school-level math concepts.
Performance of a one-week virtual overseas math camp simulation and development of improvement plans incorporating peer feedback
Reflection on cultural sensitivity and professional expertise as an educator through service-learning journaling

resources: Open-Source Software for Mathematics Education (e.g., GeoGebra)
Video Conferencing Tools for Virtual Camp Operations
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
